title: Person of Interest - John's death (05x13)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: At the end of the day, John wasn't a super spy or even a hero. He was a kid who just wanted to grow up and be like his dad.

First he gets his shoulder torn to bits, then three guys tear the shit out of him with machine guns, THEN A FREAKING BALLISTIC MISSILE?  

Samaritan went overkill.
Certainly one of the more sadness moment in this fantastic show... Miss you forever John <3
John was a good man, he fought for what he believed in until the very last moment. (cries)
well at least he can now be with Carter
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 13
